name: GCExtendedGamepadSnapshot
desc: A recording of all of the values provided by a GCExtendedGamepad object.

items.name: init(snapshotData: Data)
items.desc: Initializes a snapshot object with the flattened data representation obtained from another snapshot.

items.name: init(controller: GCController, snapshotData: Data)
items.desc: Initializes a snapshot object associated with a specific controller using a flattened data representation obtained from another snapshot.

items.name: var snapshotData: Data
items.desc: Flattens a snapshot into an archivable memory representation.

items.name: struct GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100
items.desc: A structure that holds a snapshot of an extended gamepad controllerâ€™s input data.

items.name: func NSDataFromGCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100(UnsafeMutablePointer<GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100>?) -> Data?
items.desc: Encapsulates the controller data from an extended gamepad structure into an NSData object.

items.name: func GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100FromNSData(UnsafeMutablePointer<GCExtendedGamepadSnapShotDataV100>?, Data?) -> Bool
items.desc: Copies the recorded data from an extended gamepad snapshot into a readable structure.
